title: Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar is a popular tourist destination known for its long sandy beach.

title: Sreemangal
description: Sreemangal is often called the 'Land of Two Leaves and a Bud' due to its tea gardens.

title: Sundarbans
description: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world and home to the Bengal tiger.

title: Sajek
description: Sajek Valley offers breathtaking views of the hills and is a serene getaway.
